item.title: PBR
item.description: score:103 Chances: Petrobras (PBR) has leveraged advanced technology to discover oil in Brazil’s unexplored Potiguar Basin, marking a new frontier for the company. The company is engaged in oil and gas exploration, production, and distribution activities, operating through various segments including Exploration and Production, Refining, Transportation, and Marketing, Gas and Power, and Corporate and Other Business.
